column1: # Sound start and duration are given in 1/1024's of step duration (1024 = 100% of step)
# Step duration is given in 1/1024's of a measure (e.g. a quarter note is 256 ticks)
# C     D     E  F     G     A     B
# D     E     F# G     A     B     C#
# D     E     F# G     A     B     C#
# D     E     F# G     A     B     C#
# D     E     F# G     A     B     C#
